Address.Address1: POLIGONO INDUSTRIAL LOS AGUSTINOS C/B S/N

Description.Text:
Location
The hotel is located in the largest commercial centre in Pamplona, Los Angustinos. It is only 4 km to the town and tourist centre of Pamplona. Noain airport is located approximately 15 km away.
Facilities
Opened in 2006, this hotel is lovingly decorated and furnished to offer guests the maximum in comfort. The modern interiors are characterised by clear lines, comfort and functionality. The hotel comprises 5 halls with a total of 400 m² for conferences, private parties and cultural events. This hotel comprises a total of 60 rooms spread over 2 floors and offers a lobby with a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe and a lift. The dining options on offer in the restaurant are based on regional dishes which may be chosen à la carte or as a daily set menu. There is also a laundry service, parking and a kids' club available.
Rooms
The rooms offer all fittings guests could wish for. They come with an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and cosmetics, background music, a direct dial telephone, satellite/ cable LCD TV, a minibar, an Internet connection, and a double or king-size bed, various types of pillow (hard, medium or soft) and a hire safe. The air conditioning is centrally regulated. There is 1 junior suite as well as 2 wheelchair accessible rooms.
Sports/Entertainment
Guests are invited to take advantage of a fully equipped gym with 2 step machines, a treadmill, a home trainer, stomach trainer, sauna and hammam.
Meals
Guests may serve themselves at the breakfast buffet. At lunchtime and in the evenings guests may select dishes from the set menu or choose from the à la carte option. It is also possible to book a half-board or full board stay.
Payment
American Express, Diners Club, MasterCard and VISA are all accepted in the hotel.
How to get there
The hotel is easy to reach, for example, via the A 15 from San Sebastián, Vitoria, Bilbao or France.

LocationThe hotel is located in the largest commercial centre in Pamplona; Los Angustinos. It is only 4 km to the town and tourist centre of Pamplona. Noain airport is located approximately 15 km away.
